mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, surname, email, phone, type, active) VALUES (#{name}, #{surname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{active});
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, surname, email, phone, type, active FROM users;
SELECT id, name, surname, email, phone, type, active FROM users WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, surname = #{surname}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, type = #{type}, active = #{active} WHERE id = #{id};
